mapper.select: select c.id,p.nick_name,p.avatar from party p left join support_chat_info c on p.id= c.party_id where p.user_name like concat('%',#{parameters},'%') or p.nick_name like concat('%',#{parameters},'%') or p.user_code like concat('%',#{parameters},'%') or c.remarks like concat('%',#{parameters},'%') order by c.party_id DESC limit 20
